man mechchara wela samasthaya gana katha kare naha.mokada ehema kathakirimath api ahaka yana ee thalayak puke thiyaganimak nisa.dan kattiyamameka puke thiyan iwarane.ee nisa aaye meke rakaganna deyak naha..mata ahanna thiyenne ohoma ekak dakka paliyata dan oyalath ookapili aran neweda oya katha karanne ?ookama neweda oowa eliyata dapu minissunge uwamanawa ?methana thiyennepodi lamayek maruna ekak gana prashnayak wath , ape bauddha kama ganawath prashnayak newe..ee wagema boru mawa gath bodu kamak , sith pirisuduyayi anunta penwimata ganna uthsahayen ( gon part eken ) wennethawa thawa api meke prapathetama yana eka..oya rupa tika dakiddi polowa palan yanna hithenawa, eeth api hithanna oonemechchara kalekata napu widiyo ekak aawe kohomada kiyala dan ekaparata me manawa himi kam sasi asse ..hamoma dannawa athi kellekge gawuma uda giyath hadda pitisara gamaka , eeka kolambaaenawa..kolambaa eka gamata yanawa..ehema rataka hithanawada meka mita kalin apemama lik nowi eka parata pransen mathuwenne kohomada kiyala dingak ?shri maha bodiyata koti gahapu ekath methana inna oone kenek balala athi.
